attributes.action: move the cost of the road fund licence onto fuel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am disabled, and need my car but only drive a small number of miles each year.  However, I still have to pay the full Road Fund Licence for my car.
I believe this tax should be moved onto fuel, it would be a more equitable tax being based on mileage rather than a simple blanket tax.
Also, larger engined vehicles, using more fuel,  would pay the lions share.  I know this would have an effect on food and other basic costs, but I believe these costs should be minimal, and would generate greater efficiency in the use of road fuel by the transport companies.
I fully support this motion.
